title: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62)
description: The rock-cut tomb of the Egyptian pharaoh Tutankhamun (r. ca. 1332-1323 BC), discovered by Howard Carter in 1922.

properties.description: Tomb of pharaoh Tutankhamun (r. ca. 1332-1323 BC), discovered by Howard Carter in 1922. Location verified in Google Earth 2013 based on OSM coordinates.
properties.title: Imagery location of Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV 62)
